Author: DearestToMyHeart
Text: Yes. Doesn't help if it's hot outside. My blood pressure just drops really low  I'm 99% sure I have POTS

Author: j4jackj
Text: That's not happened to me, but I did find my blood sugar went up very high (~7.5mmol/L) on a 24+ hour fast and it went down when I ate some food. I never fasted that long again. You seem to be having the opposite problem - hypoglycemia.
